_meta.title: Masculine Spiral: Field-to-Point Reduction (Definitive)
_meta.description: A definitive, step-by-step logical reduction of a quantum information field (Level 8) to a classical singularity (Level 0). Each level resolves a fundamental duality through integration and symmetry breaking.

initial_state_L8.description: Maximal entropy state. A uniform superposition of 256 possibilities. No inherent structure or meaning.

final_state_L7.description: The primary symmetry break partitions the 256 states into two 128-state sectors. This imposes the first fundamental category.
final_state_L7.resolved_duality: Information is now categorized into opposing sets, e.g., 'Fermionic' (exclusive) and 'Bosonic' (inclusive) state types. The principle of distinction is born.

initial_state_L7.description: Information exists in a high-dimensional, abstract space with 128 degrees of freedom.

final_state_L6.description: Redundant informational dimensions are compactified (e.g., 10D → 4D). Information becomes structured and localized.
final_state_L6.resolved_duality: A clear distinction emerges between external, manifest dimensions and internal, curled-up dimensions that define the intrinsic properties of the system.

initial_state_L6.description: The system possesses a high degree of symmetry and potential pathways for evolution.

final_state_L5.description: A major symmetry breaks (SO(5) → SO(4)), creating 'Goldstone modes'—effective, functional degrees of freedom. Abstract properties become concrete forces.
final_state_L5.resolved_duality: The system is no longer uniform. The duality between a 'conserved' property (the remaining SO(4) symmetry) and the new 'emergent' forces is established.

initial_state_L5.description: System has defined forces but no stable laws of interaction.

final_state_L4.description: The forces are organized into a 16-element algebra. This creates stable, predictable interaction patterns ('quadra dynamics') defined by personality tensors Γᵘᴠ.
final_state_L4.resolved_duality: The duality between 'attraction' and 'repulsion' is codified into systemic laws. Interactions are no longer random but governed by the system's metric.

initial_state_L4.description: The system exhibits complex, emergent social behaviors governed by intricate laws.
initial_state_L4.duality_to_resolve: Complex Behavior vs. Simple underlying Principles.

final_state_L3.description: All complex behaviors are reduced to the interactions of 8 fundamental operators (trigrams), from pure receptivity (Kun, I⊗I⊗I) to pure creativity (Qian, X⊗X⊗X).
final_state_L3.resolved_duality: The core duality between pure Receptivity (000) and pure Action (111) is isolated. All other dynamics are defined as partial states between these poles.

initial_state_L3.description: The system is defined by dynamic flows of energy and information.

final_state_L2.description: Dynamic processes are integrated into 4 static, elemental principles: Earth (Form, I⊗I), Fire (Transformation, I⊗X), Water (Merging, X⊗I), Air (Distinction, X⊗X).
final_state_L2.resolved_duality: The primary duality is now structural: the opposition between the fixed, stable axis (Earth ↔ Air) and the fluctuating, relational axis (Fire ↔ Water).

initial_state_L2.description: A 2D plane of four cardinal points defining the system's structure.
initial_state_L2.duality_to_resolve: Multi-axial Structure vs. A Single Defining Principle.

final_state_L1.description: The entire 2D plane is projected onto a single binary axis, collapsing the four principles into two concepts: Container (|0⟩) and Contained (|1⟩).
final_state_L1.resolved_duality: The ultimate, irreducible duality of existence: The Field that perceives vs. the Particle that is perceived. Knower vs. Known.

initial_state_L1.description: The final quantum bit of information. The logical opposition between two states.

final_state_L0.description: The final distinction is resolved. The Knower and the Known merge into a single, self-aware point. Information becomes Being.
final_state_L0.resolved_duality: All duality ceases. The result is a singularity of perfect coherence and zero entropy. The process is complete.
